packages.name: Christening Package
inclusions: Impressive buffet tables with setup & center piece
Guest tables with floor length cloth, motif topper and center piece
Elegant dressed up monoblock chairs with cover & ribbon
Gift and cake table with skirting

menuPackages.name: Lunch or Dinner
items: Choice of chicken or fish dish

menuPackages.name: Lunch or Dinner
items: Appetizer: (roasted peanuts, or kropek or chips)

terms: Additional 10% Service charge
Upon Confirmation of Reserved date, 50% down payment is required upon contract signing & full settlement of balance is 3 days before or due immediately after the function.
50% of the contract or any deposited amount will be forfeited for any cancellation made (6) days before the function
Reservation fee is Php 3000.00 (non-refundable if party is cancelled)
Overtime fee of P100.00/hour after 4 hours of service and Php 100.00 per floor for each waiter if the function is held in a building w/o service elevator
Distance fee of Php 100.00 per waiter if venue is far from the unloading area
Additional Transportation fee for out-of-town venue or 10km radius from the office
Additional Php 6000.00 for special back drop with theme and elevated platform.
Additional fee for Lechon Chopper (Php 600.00 per Lechon)
Additional Php 80.00 per head for Tiffany chair
Additional extra charge for special backdrop & decoration
Any losses, breakages, gate entrance fee & caterer bond of the venue will be added to the client
Client to bring container for left over

items: Cake arch balloons and centerpiece balloons

menuFoodSelections.name: Vegetables
menus: Fresh lumpia ubod with peanut sauce w/ homemade wrapper
Special Oriental Chopsuey with quail eggs
Mixed vegetables with Ham & quail egg in cream sauce
Stir fry buttered mix vegetable in oyster sauce
Chinese kangkong with ground pork & tofu in oyster sauce
Stir fry bean sprout, carrots & cabbages
Fresh cucumber salad with lime dressing

menuFoodSelections.name: Pasta and Noodles
menus: White cream pasta w/ Tuna chunks

menuFoodSelections.name: Fish
menus: Breaded fish fillet with mayo mustard dip
Fish fillet with tofu & black beans
Fish fillet in lemon butter sauce
Steamed fish fillet with white sauce and quail eggs
Grilled blue marlin or tuna steak for Php 450.00 and up
Grilled fish in lemon butter sauce

menuFoodSelections.name: Chicken
menus: Breaded chicken cordon bleu in white cream sauce
Chicken strip teriyaki with bean sprout
Chicken with mushroom in cream sauce
Chicken in BBQ sauce with potato marbles and Quail eggs
Steamed cordon bleu with white cream sauce
Hongkong style fried chicken with chips

menuFoodSelections.name: Pork
menus: Spicy Pork Spareribs in barbecue sauce with potato marbles and quail eggs
Pork supreme in mushroom and quail eggs
Pork with Mushroom in Cream sauce
Roast Pork Loin in mushroom gravy sauce with mashed potato
Pork legs Kare-kare with special bagoong
Chinese style Lechon kawali with sauce

menuFoodSelections.name: Beef
menus: Roast beef in mushroom gravy sauce with mashed potato
Beef with mushroom in cream sauce
Beef with Brocolli and green peas in oyster sauce
Shredded beef with red & green bell pepper and butter mushroom
Beef oxtail Kare-kare with special bagoong alamang
Beef strips steak with onion rings, potato and bell pepper
Hawaiian beef asado with pineapple chunks

menuFoodSelections.name: Dessert
menus: Coffee Jelly with Cream and Tapioca
Mango Jelly with Cream and Tapioca
Penne or Macaroni Chicken salad for Php 350.00 and up
